title: High school Fake Movie Project, 2013
desc: The project required us to write a complete movie plot, make 10 movie stills using Photoshop to represent important moments from the plot, and make a poster. I used the Olsen twins as my inspiration for the movie.

title: Vintage-inspired Fake Movie Poster, 2018
desc: Another movie poster. The project asked us to find a vintage movie poster and replicate it with our own style. I played around with the blending mode, brushes and colours. I also designed the movie title myself.

title: Quote Interpretation, 2018
desc: I was heavily inspired by the Scott Pilgrim movie and the Chainsmoker's Memories... Do Not Open album. When the quote talks about imagination, I immediately thought about a kid in her PJ imagining fighting a monster on the top of a mountain.

title: Contagion-inspired Poster, 2020
desc: I was bored and stuck at home. Everyone was talking about Contagion, the movie. I thought the poster for the movie looked pretty neat, so I wanted to make my own poster with my friends instead.
